title: Quick Question, When will Snow Fawn Poppy be available?
body: I wanted to gift someone special the skin right when it came out, but the patch got applied but the skin is not here

replies.body: The new skins don't typically hit the store for a couple days, but I'd be sure to check by on the weekend!

Oh so thats why the skins are not out. Thanks for the info. Im so buying that poppy skin. CUTEST SKIN EVER!!!!!üòç 

Also GO TANKS!!! 
Tank main for life.
But when are they coming for Europe?
